name: bag 1
description: an outer garment extending either to the waist or the hips, typically having sleeves and a fastening down the front.

name: bag 2
description: an outer garment covering the body from the waist to the ankles, with a separate part for each leg.

name: bag 3
description: a covering for the foot, typically made of leather, having a sturdy sole and not reaching above the ankle.

name: bag 4
description: a container made of flexible material with an opening at the top, used for carrying things.
